vista.graph
Class CurvePathIterator

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.CurvePathIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.geom.PathIterator
public class CurvePathIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.geom.PathIterator

A PathIterator for the Curve to outline its shape. This implementation is to avoid using GeneralPath as that would be very expensive in terms of memory and speed.

Version:
$Id: CurvePathIterator.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:53 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
